text: Gary Lightbody was born on 15 June 1976 in Northern Ireland.Gary Lightbody on VideoInside.org He is the lead singer of the alternative rock band Snow Patrol. He first started Snow Patrol under the name "Polar Bears" while at the University of Dundee, Scotland, in 1994. ==References== Category:Irish singers Category:Musicians from Northern Ireland Category:Rock guitarists Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Gary Lightbody
